title: Aspect Ratio
description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

body.raw:
## Installation 1. Install the `@radix-ui/react-aspect-ratio` component from radix-ui: ```bash npm install @radix-ui/react-aspect-ratio ``` 2. Copy and paste the following code into your project. This is the `` primitive. You can place it in a file at `components/ui/aspect-ratio.tsx`. ## Usage ```tsx import Image from "next/image" import { AspectRatio } from "@/components/ui/aspect-ratio" ``` ```tsx
```

import { AspectRatio } from "@/components/ui/aspect-ratio"

      <Image
        src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1576075796033-848c2a5f3696?w=800&dpr=2&q=80"
        alt="Photo by Alvaro Pinot"
        fill
        className="rounded-md object-cover"
      />
    </AspectRatio>
  )
}
